title: What is React.js ?
description: React JS is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces – usually for single-page and mobile applications. A user interface in React is built around components. Each of these components is a Javascript function defined by the user. These components optionally accept inputs, i.e. props (properties), and return React elements that describe exactly how a section of the UI (user interface) should appear accordingly. React applications are usually built around a single HTML element, often called the root node.
